plugin.name: nas
plugin.description: NAS (Network Audio System) support for GStreamer

element.name: nassink
element.description: Plays audio to a Network Audio Server
element.author: Laurent Vivier <Laurent.Vivier@bull.net>, Arwed v. Merkatz <v.merkatz@gmx.net>

caps.name: sink
caps.details: audio/x-raw-int, endianness=(int)1234, signed=(boolean)true, width=(int)16, depth=(int)16, rate=(int)[ 1000, 96000 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2 ]; audio/x-raw-int, signed=(boolean)false, width=(int)8, depth=(int)8, rate=(int)[ 1000, 96000 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2 ]
